summary.span: 命名空間 (Namespace) 包含轉譯控制項的類別，以及其他在支援的作業系統中具有視覺化樣式的 Windows 使用者介面 (UI) 項目。

span.span: The namespace contains classes for rendering controls and other Windows user interface (UI) elements with visual styles in operating systems that support them.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 命名空間包含下列主要類別：The namespace contains the following main classes: - 是用來識別任何控制或視覺化樣式所支援的 UI 項目基礎類別。 is a foundation class for identifying any control or UI element supported by visual styles. 除了 本身以外， 命名空間還包含許多具有 `static` 屬性的 巢狀類別，該屬性會為視覺化樣式支援的控制項、控制項組件或其他 UI 項目的每個狀態，傳回 。In addition to itself, the namespace includes many nested classes of with `static` properties that return a for every state of a control, control part, or other UI element supported by visual styles. 例如，屬性類別會傳回，識別使用視覺化樣式的狀態為 pressed 的按鈕。For example, the property of the class returns a that identifies a button in the pressed state with visual styles. - 提供方法，以繪製，並取得有關每個資訊目前作業系統的視覺化樣式所定義。 provides methods that draw and get information about each defined by the current visual style of the operating system. 系統可以擷取的項目資訊包括：其預設大小、背景類型和色彩定義。Information that can be retrieved about an element includes its default size, background type, and color definitions. - 提供一組`static`提供作業系統目前的視覺化樣式資訊的屬性。 provides a set of `static` properties that provide information about the current visual style of the operating system. 命名空間也包含一組列舉。The namespace also includes a set of enumerations. 部分這些列舉型別，例如和，提供狀態相關的視覺化樣式項目的定義。Some of these enumerations, such as and , provide state definitions for related visual style elements. 大部分的其他列舉型別支援方法可傳回特定的項目相關的資訊。Most of the other enumerations support methods that return information about a particular element. 例如，列舉型別提供的引數可能值方法。For example, the enumeration provides the possible argument values for the method. 最後，列舉型別提供定義如何視覺化樣式的值目前套用至應用程式。Finally, the enumeration provides values that define how visual styles are currently applied to the application.
